name: Illum (itch)
description:
Welcome to Illum, a casual 3rd person adventure game! 

In this game, you will: explore and solve puzzles by connecting light gems with your little light friend to light up a dark, sleeping kingdom, and see what changes you will make!

Genreadventure, puzzle-solving, atmospheric, casualLength10-20 minsPlatformPC&MacOSDeveloperPrivate Void Studio
